CSV

Class LoadManifest

  • java.lang.Object
    • CSV.LoadManifest

  • public class LoadManifest
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that contains static methods used for loading a manifest from a file and adding it to the store
    Author:
    Brendan Doncaster

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LoadManifest() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void LoadManifestCSV(java.lang.String file)
      Takes the manifest created from the selected directory and adds the items to the store and subtracts its cost from the store's capital
      static Manifest ReadManifestCSV(java.lang.String file)
      Reads the selected file directory and turns its contents into a Manifest

    • Constructor Detail

      • LoadManifest

        public LoadManifest()

    • Method Detail

      • LoadManifestCSV

        public static void LoadManifestCSV(java.lang.String file)
                            throws DeliveryException,
                                   CSVFormatException,
                                   java.io.IOException,
                                   StockException
        Takes the manifest created from the selected directory and adds the items to the store and subtracts its cost from the store's capital
        Parameters:
        file - String format of the file directory of a CSV formatted manifest
        Throws:
        DeliveryException - when called methods throw a DeliveryException
        CSVFormatException - when CSV has incorrect amount of fields, tries to load items before a truck or does not exist
        java.io.IOException - when called methods throw an IOException
        StockException - when called methods throw a StockException

      • ReadManifestCSV

        public static Manifest ReadManifestCSV(java.lang.String file)
                                throws DeliveryException,
                                       CSVFormatException,
                                       java.io.IOException,
                                       StockException
        Reads the selected file directory and turns its contents into a Manifest
        Parameters:
        file - String format of the file directory of a CSV formatted manifest
        Returns:
        Manifest object version of the csv file
        Throws:
        DeliveryException - when truckType of a truck is unrecognised
        CSVFormatException - when fields in the csv are incorrect or missing, or the file doesn't exist
        java.io.IOException - default exception throws
        StockException - when addItemName string is invalid
        See Also:
        IOException
